title: Count the Number of Good Subsequences

content.content: This not medium. First we need to find count pattern. Then it is related to combination. To compute combination, we need Fermat\'s Little Thm.
Can some one explain this question?\nWhat is the example of good subsequences in case "aabb"?
To reduce the time of step by step calculation part using pow(n,p-2,p), we could use https://oi-wiki.org/math/number-theory/inverse/ \n\n\u7EBF\u6027\u6C42\u9006\u5143
